title: credentials are requested multiple times for a tricky ///crcns/aa-1
body:
```shell
(venv) giuly@giuly-ThinkPad-T480s:~/test/aa-1$ datalad get *
Total:   0%|                                                                                                                 | 0.00/10.3M [00:00<?, ?B/s]You need to authenticate with 'crcns' credentials. https://crcns.org/request-account/ provides information on how to gain access
[INFO   ] To obtain some keys we need to fetch an archive of size 7.0 MB                                                                                 
You need to authenticate with 'crcns' credentials. https://crcns.org/request-account/ provides information on how to gain access
user: You need to authenticate with 'crcns' credentials. https://crcns.org/request-account/ provides information on how to gain access
user: You need to authenticate with 'crcns' credentials. https://crcns.org/request-account/ provides information on how to gain access
user: You need to authenticate with 'crcns' credentials. https://crcns.org/request-account/ provides information on how to gain access
user: You need to authenticate with 'crcns' credentials. https://crcns.org/request-account/ provides information on how to gain access
user: You need to authenticate with 'crcns' credentials. https://crcns.org/request-account/ provides information on how to gain access
user: 
```
and to kill this thing -- it is really hard
